snippet: Nathan Tinkler, a 36-year-old Australian billionaire, is leading a group that has offered to take Whitehaven private, in a bid that is more than 50 percent above the coal company's trading price.
abstract: Nathan Tinkler, a 36-year-old Australian billionaire, is leading a group that has offered to take Whitehaven private, in a bid that is more than 50 percent above the coal company's trading price.

headline.main: Coal Magnate Offers $5.4 Billion for Whitehaven Coal
